description: A kindergarten which teaches good values in daily life as well as Islamic-oriented education
A kindergarten which teaches good values in daily life as well as Islamic-oriented education
R.E.A.L is an educational philosophy that guides and inspires all our ideas and endeavours.
At Smart Reader Kids, we encourage recognition of students achievements and contributions.
The continuity of Q-dees Programs empowers child every step in their journey towards a global standard of academic and creative development from Preschool to Primary School level.
